title: Subchapter D - Adult-Care Facilities
content:
Subchapter D - Adult-Care Facilities

State Regulations

Part 485 - General Provisions (§ 485.1 to 485.18)

Part 486 - Inspection And Enforcement (§ 486.1 to 486.13)

Part 487 - Standards For Adult Homes (§ 487.1 to 487.15)

Part 488 - Adult Care Facilities Standards For Enriched Housing (§ 488.1 to 488.14)

Part 489 - Adult Care Facilities Standards for Family-type Homes (§ 489.1 to 489.17)

Part 490 - Standards For Residences For Adults (§ 490.0 to 490.17)

Part 491 - Shelters For Adults (§ 491.1 to 491.27)

Part 492 - Adult-care Facilities Standards For Day Programs For Nonresidents (§ 492.1 to 492.12 to 492.28)

Part 493 - Hearing Procedure: Residential Care Programs For Adults (§ 493.1 to 493.14)

Part 494 - Assisted Living Program (§ 494.1 to 494.11 to 494.14)

Part 495 - [Repealed]
State regulations are updated quarterly; we currently have two versions available. Below is a
comparison between our most recent version and the prior quarterly release. More comparison features will be added as we have more versions to compare. No prior version found.
